metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7874 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An invalid memory address dereference was discovered in strlenext inutil/decompile.c in libming 0.4.8. The vulnerability causes a segmentationfault and application crash, which leads to denial of service.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
